analysis.description:
BCSToken (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#3-11) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#6-7)

Reentrancy in investment._withdraw (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#128-139):
	External calls:
	- dc.transfer(_user,outcome[_user]) (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#132-133)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- dateDeposit (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#137)
	- day (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#134-137)
	- outcome (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#138-139)

Reentrancy in investment.deposit (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#149-163):
	External calls:
	- dc.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_amount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#154-156)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- amount (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#156-158)

investment.deposit (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#149-163) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-dc.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_amount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#154-156)

Reentrancy in investment._withdraw (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#128-139):
	External calls:
	- dc.transfer(_user,outcome[_user]) (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#132-133)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- rewardPerYear (/unique_chucks/24/0xac0bcffb2c52e6061fdc67bf26548e501addcf45.sol#137)
